definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: They entered the property and followed the internal road until the entryway of the house.
sentences.chinese: 她们进入了庄园，沿着主干道来到房子的入口通道。

sentences.english: Hence, people just follow this trunk road, move to the southern Ghana.
sentences.chinese: 因此，人们只是沿着这条主干道，移动到南加纳。

sentences.english: Firstly, the mechanisms of the corridor effects of the urban transport artery on land use are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 城市交通干道对沿线土地利用存在廊道效应。

sentences.english: One is called Medicine Capital North Street.
sentences.chinese: 其中一条主干道的名字就叫“药都北大街“。

sentences.english: The road goes around in a loop and rejoins the main road about 2 kilometers past the town.
sentences.chinese: 这条路呈环状，在城外两公里处与干道会合。

sentences.english: The store stands back from the main road.
sentences.chinese: 那家商店位于交通干道的后面。

sentences.english: They learned directions to the market, which sat adjacent to a main boulevard.
sentences.chinese: 他们知道了到那市场的方向，那在主要干道的边上。

sentences.english: The traffic diversion was due to an accident on the mainroad.
sentences.chinese: 车辆改道是因为干道上发生了交能事故。

sentences.english: Big Mosque on the main road of Omdurman.
sentences.chinese: 恩图曼干道上的大清真寺。

sentences.english: Dalian Zhongshan Road is the first main road.
sentences.chinese: 中山路是大连的第一主干道。

sentences.english: In the radial roads built between the two symmetrical style of the same church.
sentences.chinese: 在放射形干道之间建有两座对称的样式相同的教堂。

sentences.english: White panels indicate local or non-primary routes leading from the junction ahead.
sentences.chinese: 白色标牌指示从前方路口可以到达的地方或非主干道。

sentences.english: I will wait fot you in the park at the intersection of two main roads.
sentences.chinese: 我会在两条主干道交叉口的街心花园里等你。

sentences.english: This structure connects the Hamburg Tree Port area with a western motorway bypass .
sentences.chinese: 这座桥连接了汉堡自由港区与西部南速干道的支线。

sentences.english: Emphasize the link between Wangjing Road and the Fifth Ring Road.
sentences.chinese: 加强望京干道与五环路的联系。

sentences.english: How can there be a traffic jam on 16-lane highway every day?
sentences.chinese: 车道的主干道上怎么可能堵车？

definition: along the line (e.g. railway)/the region near the line
abbr. for 立體交叉|立体交叉[li4 ti3 jiao1 cha1] overpass
ring road/circle line (e.g. rail or subway)
